snippet.title: Unity 3D - First game project: Last Stand - Game Devlog #3
snippet.description:
This is Devlog where I talk about building my first game project: Last Stand. Its a Base Defender game where you need to defend against waves of zombies. The game was built using Unity Game engine. In this video I talk about how I improved the UI and created new Units.

#laststand #indiegame #gamedev #devlog
